ValidationRule.description: Closed Lost Reason/Description is required when Stage is Closed Lost
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "New_Business" && ( ISBLANK(TEXT(Closed_Reason__c)) || ISBLANK(Close_Reason_Description__c) ) && ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost") && ISCHANGED(StageName)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Closed Lost Reason is required when Stage is Closed Lost
